Intro.desc: I am Nguyen Xuan Phong, a senior student at Thang Long University and will graduate in February 2026. With a passion for user interface programming, my short-term goal is to become a Frontend Developer, focusing on building modern, fast and optimal digital experiences.

About.desc: I have 6 months of experience working with WordPress, and have a solid foundation in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Currently, I focus on developing user interfaces with React, Next.js and Tailwind CSS technologies, aiming to create products that are fast, smooth, accessible, user-friendly, while optimizing performance and ensuring aesthetics. In the future, my goal is to become a Fullstack Developer, capable of building and developing comprehensive products from frontend to backend.
